Module org.nasdanika.architecture.c4
Package org.nasdanika.architecture.c4

Interface System

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.nasdanika.common.Adaptable, ArchitectureElement, org.nasdanika.ncore.Documented, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.nasdanika.ncore.Marked, org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked, ModelElement, org.nasdanika.ncore.ModelElement, org.nasdanika.ncore.NamedElement, Node, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, org.nasdanika.ncore.Period
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemImpl
    public interface System
extends Node
    A representation of the model object 'System'. A software system is the highest level of abstraction and describes something that delivers value to its users, whether they are human or not. This includes the software system you are modelling, and the other software systems upon which your software system depends (or vice versa).

    The following features are supported:

    • External
    • Containers
    • Subsystems
    See Also:
    C4Package.getSystem()

    • Method Detail

      • isExternal

        boolean isExternal()
        Returns the value of the 'External' attribute. If true, the system is external to the system (landscape) described by the architecture. In other words it is not part of the system (landscape), but belongs to the system context/surroundings.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'External' attribute.
        See Also:
        setExternal(boolean), C4Package.getSystem_External()

      • setExternal

        void setExternal​(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'External' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'External' attribute.
        See Also:
        isExternal()

      • getContainers

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Container> getContainers()
        Returns the value of the 'Containers' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Container. Containers consituting the system.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Containers' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        C4Package.getSystem_Containers()

      • getSubsystems

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<System> getSubsystems()
        Returns the value of the 'Subsystems' containment reference list. The list contents are of type System. Subsystem is a logical grouping of related containers and subsystems.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Subsystems' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        C4Package.getSystem_Subsystems()
